participant_1.background:
My cooking skills are better than my singing skills.
I am a 30-year-old female who has been trying to be kinder to myself lately.
i am currently listening to bach.
I came to know my family by growing up with them.
we have two sons.

participant_2.background:
I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life.
i collect stamps.
I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
i volunteer in my spare time.
the kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

content.text: That is good to hear! I have been trying to be kinder to myself lately
That is great! How have you been doing that?
I have been trying to be more positive and focus on my accomplishments.
That sounds like a great idea! I am sure it will help.
I hope so! I am also trying to get out of my comfort zone and try new things.
That is awesome! I love trying new things. It is so much fun!
Me too! I recently went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
That sounds like fun! I love the beach. I went to see System of a Down live in concert once. It was one of the best experiences of my life.
Oh that sounds amazing! I love System of a Down! I have been trying to get my husband to go to a concert with me, but he does not want to.
Oh that is too bad! Concerts are so much fun! I volunteer in my spare time.
That is great! What kind of volunteer work do you do?
I help out at the local animal shelter. I love animals!
That is so kind of you! I love animals too.
I am glad to hear that! I also collect stamps.
That is interesting! I have never collected stamps before.
It is a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
